subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Mike Pelfrey went seven innings, allowed four hits and threw 122 pitches, just like Ubaldo Jimenez, but gave up one fewer run than the Rockies’ ace.
snippet: The Mets’ Mike Pelfrey went seven innings, allowed four hits and threw 122 pitches, just like Ubaldo Jimenez, but gave up one fewer run than the Rockies’ ace.
